icd10_codes.description: ST elevation (STEMI) myocardial infarction of anterior wall
icd10_codes.evidence: ECG shows ST-segment elevation in leads V1-V4. Initial troponin I is elevated at 2.3 ng/mL
Patient has a history of hypertension
Patient has a history of type 2 diabetes mellitus
acute onset of severe chest pain radiating to the left arm
associated with shortness of breath, nausea
successfully treated with PCI and stent placement
